pages.title: Asian Water Monitor
pages.text: The Asian water monitor ($(o)Varanus salvator$()) is a large varanid lizard native to South and Southeast Asia.$(br2)It is listed as Least Concern on the IUCN Red List.$(br2)It was described by Laurenti in 1768 and is among the largest squamates in the world.

pages.title: Asian Water Monitor
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)4 Colors ($(o)4 Rare Colors$())$(br2)Favourite Food: untamedwilds:food_turtle_raw$(br2)Number of Offspring: 5$(br2)Growth time: None Days
